context_bundle.summary: Observability for system health and debugging: Three pillars: Metrics (Prometheus, Grafana), Logs (ELK Stack, Loki), Traces (Jaeger, Zipkin). Metrics: time-series data (CPU, memory, request rate, error rate). Logs: structured JSON logs. Traces: distributed tracing across services. Patterns: RED (Rate, Error, Duration), USE (Utilization, Saturation, Errors), Golden Signals (latency, traffic, errors, saturation). Tools: Prometheus + Grafana (metrics), ELK (logs), Jaeger (traces), OpenTelemetry (unified).

onboarding.quick_start: Observability: Metrics (Prometheus): Counter, Gauge, Histogram. Scrape /metrics endpoint. Grafana dashboards visualize. Logs (ELK): Logstash ingests, Elasticsearch stores/indexes, Kibana visualizes. Structured logs: JSON with timestamp, level, message, context. Traces (Jaeger): spans track request across services, trace_id links spans. OpenTelemetry: unified SDK for metrics/logs/traces. Patterns: RED (Rate: requests/sec, Error: error rate %, Duration: latency p50/p99), USE (Utilization %, Saturation queue depth, Errors count). Golden Signals: latency, traffic, errors, saturation. Monitor: /metrics, /health endpoints.
common_patterns: Grafana dashboard: panels with Prometheus queries, alerts on thresholds
Jaeger traces: span = tracer.start_span('operation'), span.set_tag('user_id', 123), span.finish()
OpenTelemetry: unified SDK, auto-instrumentation, export to Jaeger/Prometheus
RED metrics: rate(requests[5m]), sum(errors)/sum(requests), histogram_quantile(0.99, duration)
Golden Signals: latency (p50, p99), traffic (req/sec), errors (%), saturation (CPU/memory %)
Health check: /health endpoint returns 200 OK, monitors dependencies
